title: Dashboard widgets not updating
description: Several users reported that real-time sales and analytics widgets on the dashboard remain frozen. Refreshing the page or clearing cache does not solve the problem.

title: Error sending contact form
description: The support contact form throws a validation error even when all fields are filled correctly. This prevents customers from reaching the help desk.

title: iOS app freezes on login
description: Multiple iPhone users reported that the mobile app becomes unresponsive right after entering credentials. Reinstalling the app does not fix the issue.

title: Product images missing
description: Some product detail pages are not loading images, leaving placeholders instead. The issue occurs on both desktop and mobile browsers.

title: Navigation menu not expanding
description: On smaller devices, the sidebar menu does not expand when clicked. This blocks users from accessing important account settings.

title: Search filter not applying
description: Users applying category filters in the search page still see unrelated results. This is affecting customers who want to narrow down product listings.

title: Billing address not saving
description: Some customers cannot save their billing addresses during checkout. Even after filling correct data, the system reverts back to blank fields.

title: Push notifications delayed
description: App push notifications for order updates arrive several hours late. Customers expect instant alerts but only receive them long after delivery.

title: File upload stuck
description: Profile file uploads never complete, showing 'uploading' status indefinitely. Users tried multiple browsers and connections with no success.

title: Search bar auto-suggestions broken
description: The search box no longer provides suggestions while typing. Customers need to type the full product name before results appear.

title: Wishlist items disappearing
description: Products added to the wishlist vanish after a page reload. Customers lose track of saved products they want to purchase later.

title: Chatbot not responding
description: Automated chatbot stays stuck on the welcome message and never processes user queries, forcing customers to contact support directly.
